content.text: The Pizza Delivery Kid was an employee of Pizza by Alfredo, the Dunder Mifflin Scranton staff's least favorite pizza place. When he would not honor Michael's coupon, Michael refused to let him leave. After realizing that he committed kidnapping, Michael let the kid go, having Dwight pay a 10% tip. On his way out, the kid flipped Michael off. He is one of the teenagers who steals Dwight's hemp (though he claims that it's "really crappy"). He is played by Kevin McHale.
